thread.title: Megan McKenna and Pete Wicks look smitten on Valentine's Day as gives her a HUGE teddy bear
thread.title_full: Megan McKenna and Pete Wicks look smitten on Valentine's Day as gives her a HUGE teddy bear

author: Alistair McGeorge
title: Megan McKenna and Pete Wicks look smitten on Valentine's Day as gives her a HUGE teddy bear
text:
Megan McKenna and Pete Wicks look smitten on Valentine's Day as gives her a HUGE teddy bear The TOWIE lovers seem to be back on track Share   Thank you for subscribing!   
Pete Wicks and Megan McKenna 's relationship looks to be going strong as they celebrate Valentine's Day together. 
It's seen as the most romantic day of the year, and so it's no surprise to see the tattooed TOWIE hunk doing his bit to make his girlfriend feel special. 
The loved up couple seemed smitten as they were snapped sharing a kiss outside Megan's home in Essex, as her beau showered her with gifts including a huge teddy bear on Tuesday morning. Pete Wicks gives Megan McKenna a sweet gift on Valentine's Day (Photo: JSH) The couple looked absolutely smitten (Photo: JSH) 
He got out of his car with the stuffed toy in one hand, and a balloon on a stick in the other - much to her delight. 
Megan was spotted beaming as she was given the sweet surprised, and she looked as stylish as ever in black skinny jeans and a studded leather jacket. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
